Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Review bug reports and the status of bug fixes. Prepare for the daily stand-up meeting.
Daily stand-up meeting with the team. Review progress on bug fixes, address any roadblocks, and coordinate tasks for the day.

Work with @Tart-1 and @3dmod-1 on any visual enhancements that can be quickly implemented in the prototype, such as improved lighting or character animations. @Tart-1 @3dmod-1 Visual improvements for the prototype.
Check in with @Aud-1 to discuss any initial sound effects or music that can be added to the prototype. This will enhance the immersion and feel of the game. @Aud-1 Sound effect discussion.
Continue playtesting the prototype, focusing on the areas where bug fixes and visual enhancements have been implemented. Identify any remaining issues.
Analyze the playtest feedback and identify areas for further improvement. Prioritize these improvements based on their impact on the gameplay and feasibility of implementation.
Check in with @Ndes-1 regarding the placeholder texts and plots. Discuss with @Ndes-1 if any adjustment needed. @Ndes-1 Discussion of Placeholder Texts
Meet with the team to discuss the overall progress of the prototype. Share feedback, brainstorm solutions to remaining issues, and plan for the next steps. @All team members
Update the project management software with progress on bug fixes, visual enhancements, and sound effects. Communicate any important updates or changes to the team.
